page.title: 04TOWN CENTRE INVERURIE
page.content:
The Town Hall stands in the centre of Inverurie. Directly in front of this is the War Memorial with the town square surrounding it.
Two car parking areas are situated in the square, but these are small and at busy shopping times they are usually full up. Another larger parking area can be found behind the Town Hall. The people of Inverurie stated in a survey that most of them think that there are not enough parking facilities in the centre. Others feel that when a by-pass is built there will be more room for shoppers to park.
Inverurie is described by most people as a quite good shopping centre for most of their requirements. Aberdeen is only 16 miles away for other shopping.
